compliant.section: The analytics providers we currently use are Google Analytics. For further information, see our Cookie Policy.
compliant.legal provisions: The policy provides information about data processing in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language. It also refers to the Cookie Policy for further details, which is good practice.

non_compliant.section: We may disclose to our business partners, including business partners who provide advertisings or marketing information that you may be interested.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Disclosing personal data for direct marketing purposes requires a legitimate interest and must be balanced against the individual's rights and freedoms. The policy doesn't mention a legitimate interest assessment or offer an opt-out for this processing.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the legal basis for disclosing data to business partners for marketing. If relying on legitimate interest, document the Legitimate Interest Assessment (LIA) and inform users about their right to object. Provide instructions on how to opt-out of such disclosures.

non_compliant.section: We may also disclose and share your Information to our service providers that provide services for or on behalf of us, including the service providers that assist us with sending marketing information, providing customer support, delivering purchases and conducting billing.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy should clearly identify the categories of recipients of the personal data. While it mentions service providers, it doesn't specify the categories. Additionally, it doesn't mention the requirement for data processing agreements with these providers.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the categories of service providers involved, such as marketing platforms, customer support tools, payment processors, etc. State that data processing agreements are in place with all service providers to ensure GDPR compliance.
